entities.name: horcruxes
entities.description: Horcruxes are objects that contain pieces of Voldemort's soul. They need to be destroyed in order to defeat him.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is a member of Dumbledore's Army and one of Harry's best friends. He is able to speak Parseltongue.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a member of Dumbledore's Army and one of Harry's best friends. She is skilled in magic and helped destroy the Horcrux.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main protagonist of the story and a member of Dumbledore's Army.

entities.name: basilisk
entities.description: The basilisk is a giant snake that was killed by Harry in his first year at Hogwarts.

entities.name: loket
entities.description: The locket is one of the Horcruxes created by Voldemort. It was opened using Parseltongue.

entities.name: huffelpuff's cup
entities.description: Huffelpuff's cup is a Horcrux that was destroyed by Hermione.

relationships.description: Ron used Parseltongue to open the locket, which is one of the Horcruxes.
Hermione destroyed Huffelpuff's cup, which was a Horcrux.
Ron and his friends were able to destroy another Horcrux, reducing the number of remaining Horcruxes.
